Basic example:
.
/i/https://www.youtube.com/embed/qkcx0kf6jME
.
<div class="iframe-container">
<iframe frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qkcx0kf6jME"></iframe>
</div>
.


Dont Render on Codeblock
.
    /i/https://www.youtube.com/embed/qkcx0kf6jME
.
<pre><code>/i/https://www.youtube.com/embed/qkcx0kf6jME
</code></pre>
.


In other content
.
# hey there
/i/https://www.youtube.com/embed/qkcx0kf6jME
.
<h1>hey there</h1>
<div class="iframe-container">
<iframe frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qkcx0kf6jME"></iframe>
</div>
.


No colon in content
.
/i/http

/i/
.
<p>/i/http</p>
<p>/i/</p>
.
